message: I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think it's worth a lot to you, and I'm willing to make a fair offer. I'll sell it to you for $100.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to sell the product. I would like to propose a price of $90 for the product.
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. However, $90 is a bit lower than I was hoping for. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, so I'll counteroffer at $95.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. I would like to propose a price of $92 for the product.
I'm glad we're getting closer, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll sell the product to you for $96.
